public class EnemyBody extends Enemy implements city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, city.cs.engine.SensorListener
creates an enemy in the game world

  • Constructor Details

    • EnemyBody

      public EnemyBody(GameWorld world, Player player, int type)
      initialises an enemybody
      Parameters:
      world - reference to the world it is creating the enemy in
      player - reference to the player that it will target and follow
      type - sets the visual appearance of the enemy created
